feed.title: SAP Community - SAP S/4HANA Public Cloud
feed.subtitle: SAP S/4HANA Public Cloud Q&A in SAP Community

entry.title: If a non-standard ISO code is added, will there be any problems
entry.content:
ISO codes are used when interfacing with external systems such as EDI.
If a non-standard ISO code is added, will there be any problems with the external system being unable to receive it?

entry.title: Deploy Scope and Organizational Structure - activities missing
entry.content:
Hi all,

We are having an issue where after changing a plant name in the organizational structure in CBC and deploying it, the plant name change hasn't changed in IMG > Define Plant.

After comparing the deployment details for successful and unsuccessful deployments it appears that the highlighted activity below is missing from the unsuccessful ones:

This is the first time this issue has occurred. We haven't changed anything, although just before this issue started a deployment had to be reactivated I believe due to someone editing a plant in IMG while the deployment was taking place, so not sure if this affected anything. 

Is anyone able to advise how to fix this?

Thanks

entry.title: Delta (statistical) depreciation areas missing in SAP S/4HANA Public Cloud, how to post Tax-Book?
entry.content:
Dear experts, 

I am working for a client where we have prepared for parallell accounting and therefore, as recommended by SAP,  switched the 0L and 2L around. That should not impact on how depreciation areas work in ledger 2L. 

In Asset accounting there are the following depreciation areas:

Ledger 0L:

  • IFRS

Ledger 2L:

  • 15 Local tax and
  • 32 Book depreciation

According to local accounting principles, the difference between Local Tax and Book should be posted as real with journal entry in AA ledgers and General Ledger at the end of the fiscal year as latest.

How should this be done in Asset Accounting as in S4HANA Public Edition the statistical ledgers are missing? For this country SAP has not even pre-delivered a G/L account for difference between local tax and book. For another country, statistical depreciation areas 92: Annual and 93: Local Tax and Book Difference exists. For this country SAP has pre-delivered also the G/L accounts for the difference posting and it works nicely on monthly basis. 

Can you please help to solve how we should manage the Local Tax-Book depreciation postings in the country where the statistical depreciation areas do not exist?

The setup is to my understanding correct in S4PC, but we have not been able to figure out how to get the difference postings done in AA.

Appreciate your help a lot, 

-ME-

P.S. the country with the statistical depreciation areas is Finland, and the country with no statistical depreciation areas is Sweden.

entry.title: Implementation Guidance on EDI Integration in SAP S/4HANA Public Cloud
entry.content:
Dear SAP Support Team,

We are currently implementing EDI integration in SAP S/4HANA Public Cloud for the first time and seek guidance on the recommended approach. Specifically, we plan to integrate the following ANSI X12 transaction sets:

  • 830 – Planning Schedule

  • 810 – Invoice

  • 856 – Advance Ship Notice

Given the restrictions and architecture of the Public Cloud edition, we would appreciate clarification on:

  1. Supported Integration Mechanisms

  2. Availability of Scope Items

  3. Mapping and Transformation Tools

  4. Partner Connectivity

  5. Monitoring and Error Handling

We would appreciate any documentation, best practices, or reference architectures that can help us plan and execute this integration effectively.

Kind Regards
Aditya Sharma
91-7489646186

entry.title: Duplicates in draft on test tenant - public cloud
entry.content:
Hi community,

I have created a managed with draft application in the public cloud. ( list report )
I tested it on the dev tenant and then transported it to the test tenant.
The testing on the dev tenant were without errors.
On the test tenant I'm encoutering the following error:
All items that i create, get the same draft uuid. Meaning once i press go I see no data as I get a duplicate error message or if I continue with the create message, i get an page error as again, my table contains duplicates.

Duplicate error:
Failed to get contexts for /sap/opu/odata4/sap/z_billing/srvd/sap/z_billing/0001/Billinginfo with start index 0 and length 30 - Error: Duplicate key predicate: (ParentId=fa163e0b-7372-1fe0-a0fd-9f1480095443,IsActiveEntity=false)

If I look into my odata response with the dev tools, I can see all my created items, still in draft mode, with a non unique draft uuid.

I'm thinking about trying out late numbering to fix the issue, but I don't understand why the issue happens in the first place.
It works fine on the dev system.

a)Any suggestions ?

Further cloud questions related to this issue.
b)How can i delete data from my draft table from the test tenant ?
  Do i need to call an api service that can delete data or build a data managing app ?
c)If I'm not mistaken, it is not possible to look into the databases on the test tenant, correct ?

Kind regards
JT

entry.title: Unable to perform automatic Serial Number assignment in Inbound delivery
entry.content:
When processing an inbound delivery, the system currently prompts me to enter the serial number manually. I would like to change this behavior so that the system automatically assigns the next sequential serial number based on the last one used for the product

entry.title: Error-No agents determined after execution of responsibility determination rule' Flexible Workflow
entry.content:
Hi All,

I have setup flexible workflow via 'Manage Workflows for supplier invoices' app based on a Custom field which was created in Supplier invoices header data. The same custom field was mapped in all the relevant 'Responsibility Management' configuration settings as well. The custom field was also assigned in Responsibility Definitions in 'Manage Teams and Responsibilities' app and approvers were assigned as well. Below is a screenshot of the error faced during submission of invoice:-

Kindly suggest a solution for this.

entry.title: Journal clearing issue
entry.content:
Dear SAP Experts,

Journal entry is not clearing item but while clearing item already included in the clearing. If the item is left then it’s not possible to clear because debit and credit not equal.

entry.title: Distribution of AVC-objects
entry.content:
Hello everyone,

How can I distribute AVC objects (such as characteristics, configuration profiles, parts lists) from one public cloud system (test system) to another public cloud system (prod system)? I couldn't find the ALE-transactions (bd91, etc.) or does it seem that ale can only be used for imports in public cloud?!

I would be very grateful for your assistance.

Regards

entry.title: Add the custom field I added to the sales order to the My Inbox application in Public Cloud
entry.content:
Hello everyone,

I have added a custom field to the sales order header information. The name of this field is YY1_AvansMiktar_SDH. I couldn't find a way to add this field to the General Information tab. Could you please assist me? When I debug with F12, I can see that the custom field is appearing behind My Inbox. Below, I am sharing the code snippet.

Thank you in advance.

I was able to successfully do this for the item.


 

{
  "d": {
    "__metadata": {

entry.title: Is there anything equivalent to /SCWM/CANCPICK on the Cloud Public Edition?
entry.content:
Hello,

Is there anything like /SCWM/CANCPICK on the Cloud Public? It is an operation to reverse the picking tasks after the reversal of the Post GI.


All the best,

Victor

entry.title: MANAGE REPAYMENT REQUEST APP NOT FOUND
entry.content:
Hi , 

we intend to use the APP Manage Repayment Request  (App IDF5754 )  but we could not find this app or any scope item associated with it.

Could you indicate to us how we can implement this APP in our S/4 Hana Public Cloud ?

At Fiori Library it is written that it is available in public cloud .

thanks and best regards

entry.title: is there any relationship between an account assignment category and a tax code on po?
entry.content:
Hi, I would like to know if there is any relationship between an account assignment category and a tax code on po.

What we did so far is below.

1. We are trying to create a po with a consumable material with the tax code "V3 (10%)" on PIR data.

2. After entering a material on a po item area, the tax code is still V3.

3. After entering an account assignment category (K), the tax code changed from V3 to V1(5%).

We want to set up 10% as a default value when we create PO.

Thank you so much.

entry.title: Down payments for Non-Trade Supplier are not applicable in Manage Down Payment Request Application
entry.content:
HI Sir/Ma'am,

Currently we have two types of suppliers, Trade and Non-Trade.  When processing down payments for Non-Trade Suppliers, we cannot use the application Manage Down Payment Request, only Trade Suppliers.  What could be the reason for this behavior and how can we resolve it or is there a workaround for this?

Thank you and God bless.

Sincerely,

 

Melvin Banggo

entry.title: Make Custom Fields Read Only - S/4Hana Public Cloud
entry.content:
Hello there,

In S/4HANA Public Cloud I would like to populate a custom field via API, and in the Fiori app “Manage Sales Orders (Version 2)” I would like to set the field property to “Read-Only” for end users.
Is there a way in S/4HANA Public Cloud to control field properties?

Kind regards,
Philipp

entry.title: CDS view required for Account Account Determination (Table T030) in S/4HANA Public Cloud
entry.content:
Hi SAP,

 

In the S/4HANA Public Cloud system, I would like to identify the reporting option or CDS view corresponding to table T030. My objective is to check the configuration of the Automatic Account Determination application. Could you please advise how a mass verification of this setup can be performed?

 

Best regards

entry.title: SAP public cloud RAP Custom action Print pdf
entry.content:
Hi experts,

I added a Print button in the RAP BDEF, and within the logic of that button, I called an Adobe Form template. It has already been sent to the print queue. How can I trigger a direct download from the front end?

 

Thanks advance

entry.title: Service contract determination on service orders
entry.content:
Hello,

I'm using the API Service Order A2X (API_SERVICE_ORDER_SRV) to migrate service orders from external systems to S/4HANA Public Cloud. There are some orders which I don't want to link to service contracts, but if I don't, there'll be errors on the UI.

Is there a way to select if I don't want service contract determination in a specific order?

Thank you, best regards.


------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Learn more about the SAP Support user and program here.

entry.title: A top level package already exists for the software component ZCUSTOM_DEVELOPMENT
entry.content:
Hello,

I am working in a SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public .

When trying to create a new package from Eclipse, under the software component ZCUSTOM_DEVELOPMENT in order to export it to the Test system later, the system is generating the following error:

A top level package already exists for the software component ZCUSTOM_DEVELOPMENT

I would be grateful for any assistance you can provide.

Thank you, best regards.
